election_record.label: Vermont 1817 Lieutenant Governor

overview.note: The Northern Sentinel (Burlington, VT), October 17, The National Standard (Middlebury, VT), October 22, North Star (Danville, VT), October 24, The Vermont Intelligencer, and Bellows Falls Advertiser (Bellows Falls, VT), October 27, and The Vermont Gazette (Bennington, VT) report 13307 votes for Paul Brigham and 7748 votes for William Chamberlain.

sub_unit.name: Westford
sub_unit.note: The original election returns note that votes in Westford were "not counted."

sub_unit.name: Franklin
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns tally sheet lists 727 votes for William Chamberlain in Franklin County; however, the sum of totals per town is 723.

sub_unit.name: Whitingham
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns tally sheet notes that votes in Whitingham were "not returned."

election_record.reference: Original Election Returns. Vermont State Archives, Middlesex.
Vermont Intelligencer, and Bellows Falls Advertiser (Bellows Falls, VT). October 27, 1817.
